title: benchmark term::benches::render_iter hits assertion
body:
Linux, x11, alacritty 1887722ef5b6ac1c1f0e4e4f62cbb02b609c1d4b
````
RUST_BACKTRACE=full cargo test --features bench

test tty::test_get_pw_entry ... ok
test util::tests::limit_works ... ok
test term::tests::reset_font_size_works ... ok
test term::tests::semantic_selection_works ... ok
test term::benches::render_iter ... FAILED

failures:

---- term::benches::render_iter stdout ----
problem with config: env: invalid type: unit value, expected a map at line 17 column 1; Using default value
thread 'term::benches::render_iter' panicked at 'assertion failed: requested < self.len', src/grid/storage.rs:199:9
````
